description: A lovely rich Bolognese Sauce topped with a Cheesey Garlic Bread Topping.
name: Garlic Bread Topped Bolognese Sauce Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Gather all ingredients together. In an ovenproof pan on low temperature, heat EVOO, add onion, garlic and capsicum and cook for 5 minutes or until softened.

Increase heat to medium - high, add mince, breaking up any lumps, season with salt & pepper if desired, stir for 3-4 minutes or until browned all over. Add spices and tomato paste, cook for 2 minutes. Add wine if using and cook until the alcohol cooks off, about a minute.
Add tomatoes and stock, stir well and lastly add the carrot, mix well again.
Put on a lid, turn down heat and simmer for 30 minutes, the last 15 minutes take lid off to allow sauce to thicken to your liking.
Slice the garlic bread all the way through, arrange on top of the sauce, pressing down into the sauce slightly, then sprinkle cheese over the top.

Bake at 200°C or 180°C fan, for about 15 minutes or until garlic bread is toasty and cheese has melted. Warning - will be extremely hot, so cool slightly. Different ovens have differing cooking times.
